column3: Why do you think that sd-jdi.jar is required? Could you please describe what exact problem is caused by its absence?

I checked again and you are right, it's not needed. It must have been a coincidence that compilation started working after adding sd-jdi.jar. The reason I added it was because compilation was failing because not finding some com.sun.jdi.* class, but those are already in tools.jar so it has nothing to do with the problem I had. I had added tools.jar, but I kept getting the error, but I must have done something wrong my self.
